sources.title: Bug | Full Drama Mystery Movie
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Bug - Bug is a 12 year old girl who finds out that her grandpa, the town's retired sheriff, may have committed and covered up a racially motivated murder years ago. Now Bug is out to right an old wrong.

2017
Stars: Glenn Morshower, Gene Jones, Heather Kafka

metadata.Plot: Having escaped her abusive ex-husband Goss, recently released from state prison, Agnes, a lonely waitress with a tragic past moves into a sleazy, rundown motel. Her lesbian co-worker R.C. introduces her to Peter, a peculiar, paranoiac drifter and they begin a tentative romance. However, things aren't always as they appear and Agnes is about to experience a claustrophobic nightmare reality as the bugs begin to arrive...
metadata.Actors: Ashley Judd, Michael Shannon, Harry Connick Jr.
